title: Compensation; expenses
context: ยง353-27 Compensation; expenses. Every conservator shall be compensated for the conservator&rsquo;s services in an amount the judge before whom the ward&rsquo;s accounts are settled considers just and proper. The conservator shall also be allowed the amount of reasonable expenses. [L 1987, c 338, pt of ยง3; am L 2004, c 161, ยง14]
